snippet: Lindsey Vonn is set to return to World Cup downhill training in St. Anton, Austria, on Thursday after an absence of more than three weeks because of an intestinal illness.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn is set to return to World Cup downhill training in St. Anton, Austria, on Thursday after an absence of more than three weeks because of an intestinal illness.

headline.main: Vonn Nears Return After Three-Week Absence
headline.print_headline: Vonn Nears Return After Three-Week Absence
